title: Perfect, stylish handmade wooden candlesticks. Finished with metal candle cup inserts for safety and...

attachments.displayName:
Perfect, stylish handmade wooden candlesticks. Finished with metal candle cup inserts for safety and style. They are the bees knees and will stand out in any home. Excellent quality and contemporary designs.
These romantic candlesticks are made from sustainable albesia  wood hand carved, ornate candlesticks ideal for holding Church Candles .
These are unbeatable value and will stand out in any room or hallway.
Each piece is individually hand painted by this lovely family in Indonesia to a high standard and supplied individually packed and bar-coded.
Wayan, the chap shown here, is the designer and head man of his village. Also a local hero because his candle holder designs have won some quite big orders with a large French department store , and he has subcontracted lots of work to practically every family in his village. This picture was taken in the paddy field right outside the small workshop they have built in an old cattle shed.
